## Discussion

The source code for a shader object can be updated at runtime. However, recompiling the fragment shader can be an expensive operation.

# source

**Instance Property**

The source code for the shader.

## Declaration

```swift
var source: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The source code for a shader object can be updated at runtime. However, recompiling the fragment shader can be an expensive operation.
title: source
